select SUBSTR(NOW()+0,10,5) from dual
INSERT INTO customer ( customer_id, store_id, first_name , last_name , email, address_id, active, create_date, last_update )VALUES ( #{customerId}, #{storeId}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{email}, #{addressId}, #{active}, #{createDate}, #{lastUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
